contentrichtext.text: '''Ensemble La Fenice''' is a period wind band based in the town of [[Auxerre]] in the [[Bourgogne]] region of [[France]]. Founded in 1990 by the [[cornett]] player [[Jean TubÃ©ry]], the ensemble specializes in music of the [[Baroque]] era played on period instruments. ==External links== [http://www.ensemblelafenice.com/index_fr_01.html La Fenice Ensemble home page (in French)] [http://www.answers.com/topic/ensemble-la-fenice-classical-musician Information about this ensemble at answers.com] * Full Wikipedia Article (in Italian)- http://it.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ensemble_La_Fenice [[Category:French orchestras]] [[Category:Chamber orchestras]] [[Category:Musical groups established in 1990]] {{France-band-stub}}
